title: Patcher stuck at Updating Interface
body: So earlier my client was scanning files forever so I deleted filearchives and it helped and I could get on but then after champ select I kept getting bugsplatted so I sent in a ticket and now the client is trying to repair but ITS stuck at updating interface at 14% but the MB is going down and the KBps is staying the same I have no idea what to do besides reinstalling but I did that last week and it took 12 hours and now im pissed off

replies.body: Deleting files can usually end up causing more harm than resolving them.  The error you’re getting may be due to missing assets it can no longer locate.  I recommend grabbing our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and restoring your client to a fresh slate.  It’s important to let the patcher continue to scan unless you are getting any errors, and that duration may differ on each PC.  Closing it out can cause it to restart completely and rescan every file for corruption.  I hope that helps clear things up.
